# [FEAT] Pre-built Dashboards

## Labels
`reporting`, `priority:high`

## Description
Implement pre-built analytics dashboards for common reporting needs.

## Requirements

### Dashboard Types
- **Support Overview**: Key metrics at a glance
- **Ticket Volume**: Trends and patterns
- **Agent Performance**: Individual and team metrics
- **Customer Satisfaction**: CSAT and NPS trends
- **SLA Performance**: Compliance tracking
- **Channel Analysis**: Cross-channel metrics
- **Knowledge Base**: Article performance

### Dashboard Components
- KPI cards/widgets
- Line charts (trends)
- Bar charts (comparisons)
- Pie charts (distributions)
- Tables and lists
- Heat maps
- Gauges

### Dashboard Features
- Date range selection
- Filter by group/agent/channel
- Drill-down capability
- Export to PDF/CSV
- Share via link
- Scheduled email reports

### Real-time Dashboard
- Live ticket counts
- Agent availability
- Queue status
- Current wait times
- Active chats

### Customization
- Widget arrangement
- Color themes
- Dashboard cloning
- Personal dashboards

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk Explore comes with seven prebuilt dashboards, each with different features, metrics, and filters to help you better visualize your data.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All dashboard types available
- [ ] Interactive filtering works
- [ ] Drill-down functional
- [ ] Export options work
- [ ] Real-time data updates
